body.name: JUMMICO Convertible Sectional Sofa Couch, 4 Seat Sofa Set for Living Room with Throw Pillows, U-Shaped Modern Minimalist Fabric Modular Sofa with Double Chaise & Memory Foam (White)
features: MODERN AND ELEGANTR DESIGN: Our sectional sofa adopts a U-shaped design, classic streamlined lines and luxurious appearance, highlighting the unique quality and texture of details, and can bring a comfortable sitting experience to your living room, study, office, conference room and etc.

STURDY AND DURABLE: Our convertible sofa adopts solid wood frame structure, which is durable and can easily meet the needs of family members sitting on the sofa. The solid black legs perfectly support the entire sofa and can be used for many years.

SOFT AND COMFORTABLE: The sectional sofa is made of soft fabric with a good touch. The cushions are filled with high-density sponge and super-elastic snake-shaped springs, allowing you to relax whether you are sitting or lying down. Please note that the compression sponge is relatively flat when you first take it out, and it takes some time before he holds it open.

HAND-PICKED MATERIALS: It’s 100% polyester for the sofa upholstery, high density and elastic sponge to ensure comfort. The cushion is supported by the sinuous springs, and the high-grade linen fabric makes this U-shaped sectional sofa elegant and comfortable.

EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Crafted for convenient shipment and easy assembly. Simple tools needed and easy to follow instructions to assemble. An adult can finish assembling within 30 minutes. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact with us.
PACKAGING: Please note that the sofa couch will be delivered in three separate packages that may arrive on different days. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Jummico is committed to pursuing comfortable furniture products, in order to create comfortable family life for our customers. Its elegant and beautiful appearance perfectly matches the living room of various styles.
Jummico Convertible Sectional Sofa Couch for Living Room with 4 Throw Pillows

What are the dimensions of this whole model? The overall dimensions of this sofa are: 110.2" L x 44.1" W x 33.4" H. Any colors besides white and grey? This modular sofa comes in two colors: grey and white. It is possible to add models in new colors in the future. Hoping my answer can help you. Are the cushion covers removable for washing? Yes, the cushion covers are removable for washing. How many people can sit on this sofa? Four people can sit comfortably on the sofa at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great affordable couch
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for an affordable couch, look no further! It is pretty easy and straight forward to assemble but make sure you attach the back of the couch correctly. The seat cushions in my opinion are very comfortable. It looks great in any space and I love it! It does come apart in 3 pieces too which makes it easy for future moving and storage! Despite it being a white couch I haven’t had any issues removing any minor stains. The only downsides are that the back cushions are more flat and the cushions do slide around. This can be easily fixed with some Velcro and additional stuffing or pillows. It arrives in 3 heavier packages and mine did arrive on separate days despite saying they were all delivered. However, the seller responded quickly and provided me with all 3 tracking numbers when I asked. Great purchase! Can’t beat the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like the layout of the couch and the color is beautiful! I plan on washing the covers to get the wrinkles out and the packing smell. The seat cushions are firm and similar to an Ikea couch. The back cushions are more like cheap pillows but for the price I can’t complain about it too much. Overall a really decent couch for the price and was pretty easy to put together by myself!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: this couch is amazing! it’s large and fits two adults and a dog comfortably. reading the reviews before purchasing, i was nervous that the couch would not be very comfortable, this could not be more wrong. it is very comfortable! it is on the firmer side (not too much) , but that’s what i would prefer. the back cushions are thin but not uncomfortable. we bought a $6 bag of poly-fil to stuff the back cushions a little more and it’s perfect now. for the price, quality, size, easy assembly, and great customer service, don’t second guess this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It'll work for now but its cheaply made definitely and for sure. The back cushions are so thin I had to put extra stuffing in them. The bottom cushions are so thin you can feel the springs easily. The velcro on one armrest is already ripping off and its only been a month. The cushions shift all over the place which really impacts how comfortable it is. I would not buy this again. I feel like there are other budgey friendly options out there

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: Sofa is a great size, and easy to assemble, for the price it’s great!The colour does differ from the picture, it is a slightly brownish grey.There are a few loose threads here and there and the back cushions do fall down but that nothing that a pair or scissors and a bit of Velcro won’t fix.Overall very satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The couch sucks and hasn’t even lasted a few weeks. It’s not comfortable at all and the cushions move apart easily. Do not buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my first apartment
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this! The fabric is soft and it was easy to put together. It also looks great!My only con like others have stated would be the back pillows. I plan on buying cheap pillows to add in through the zipper for more support. But even with that, it is still worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As far as shipping could’ve been better only was giving one tracking number recieved 2 pieces out of 3 contact the seller and was told to “kindly be patient” then given another tracking number for the other piece that got separated. Overall the couch is beautiful and it’s pretty big for a great price and the color is exactly how it’s displayed in the photo just wish the cushions was more fluffier but overall I highly recommend this is a great couch for the price!
